queries.name: Which is the warmest room between the Podium and the Markbucks?
queries.value: SELECT ?room ?temperature WHERE {graph ?expiryDateInMs { VALUES(?room) { ( <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Podium> ) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/MarkBucks>) } ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasTemperature> ?temperature. } } ORDER BY DESC(?temperature) LIMIT 1

queries.name: What is the temperature of Activity 4?
What is the strenght of the wifi in the Podium and the Markbucks?
queries.value: SELECT ?room ?wifiSignal WHERE {graph ?expiryDateInMs { VALUES(?room) { ( <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Podium> ) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/MarkBucks>) } ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasWiFiSignal> ?wifiSignal. } } ORDER BY DESC(?wifiSignal)

queries.name: Which office is the warmest?
queries.value: SELECT ?room ?temperature WHERE {graph ?expiryDateInMs { VALUES(?room) { ( <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room20> ) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room22>) } ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasTemperature> ?temperature. } } ORDER BY DESC(?temperature) LIMIT 1

queries.name: Which meeting room is the most comfortable?
queries.value: SELECT ?room  ( STR((<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float>(?temp)+<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float>(?h))/(<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float>(?ppl)))  AS ?comfort) WHERE { graph ?g { VALUES(?room) {(<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room22>) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Podium>)}. ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasPeopleCount> ?ppl }. graph ?g1 {VALUES(?room) {(<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room22>) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Podium>)}. ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasHumidity> ?h }. graph ?g2 {VALUES(?room) {(<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room22>) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Podium>)}. ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasTemperature> ?temp }.} ORDER BY ASC(?comfort) LIMIT 1

queries.name: Which room is the warmest? (unfeasible)
queries.value: SELECT ?room ?temperature WHERE {graph ?expiryDateInMs { VALUES(?room) { ( <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room20> ) (<http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Room22>) ( <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/Podium> ) ( <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/location/MarkBucks> )} ?room <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/hasTemperature> ?temperature. } } ORDER BY DESC(?temperature) LIMIT 1

queries.name: What is the temperature of Room 22?
What is the temperature of Room 20?
How many people are there in Podium?

updatequery: SELECT ?room ?validityGraph ?prop ?val WHERE { graph ?validityGraph { ?room ?prop ?val } . graph <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/graph/static> {?room a <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/robo/Location> } . FILTER (?validityGraph != <http://data.open.ac.uk/kmi/graph/static> ) } ORDER BY ?room
